OOC:Most interesting way to get rid of teh attack. Now if you didn't 
take any damage i would be angry but since you took some I am 
satified.

IC:As the beast mad with fury and rage begins snapping at 
Auron, "Well well well didn't expect you to withstand that"
 as teh beast snaps wildely at him he backs off a little smiling as 
he does so, as he backs up he gets a idea that might just help him 
out some. AS Auron holds out his hand and the beast snaps at it while 
its mouth is open a small hole opens up in the middle of Aurons 
hand "Take this" as he says this a huge saber springs into his hand 
and straight toward the beasts mouth at point blank range as it 
finishes coming out Auron smiles and looks to see if its head is 
impaled on his red hot blade of energy


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> He howls in fury, but little real damage is done (in this mode he 
has 
> 3 weaknesses 1 is silver and I'll never tell you the other 2 unless 
> you beat me up one heck of alot worse than in 6th grade).  He 
slashes 
> and bites madly at Auron.
>

> > As Auron senses the huge powerful evil serge of energy coming 
befoer

his 
> > pointed ears hear the large howl he turns slugisly around facing 
his 
> > opponent his red icy eyes starte at his opponent as he jumps in 
the 
> > air ready to destroy Auron. "Fool never do such a straightfoward 
> > attack" Auron says as the claws come down upon where he is with 
his 
> > dark black wings extended behind him he brings up his hands 
floating 
> > in the air. As the hands cuple together vying for domination over

as 
> > his arms begsin to buckle "Hum nice strenght" he grunts under his 
> > breath as his joints creak allitle. "But you have left yourself 
> open" 
> > as he says this his chest begins to open revealing a small yet 
> > powerful gun built into it. "Now feel my rath" as he says this a 
> ball 
> > of energy begins building near the end of it. As it builds into a 
> > huge black ball of energy it seems as if electricity is running 
from 
> > it as its power serges, "Now feel this" he says as he releases it 
> > while holding night menace. As the ball is fired at him he holds 
on 
> > with all of his might so that there will be hardly any escape
> >
